definition: belonging to or befitting a supreme ruler, a piece of luggage carried on top of a coach
details:
adjective
- belonging to or befitting a supreme ruler
= example: belonging to or befitting a supreme ruler
= synonyms: purple
- befitting or belonging to an emperor or empress
= example: befitting or belonging to an emperor or empress
- relating to or associated with an empire
= example: relating to or associated with an empire
- of or belonging to the British Imperial System of weights and measures
noun
- a piece of luggage carried on top of a coach
- a small tufted beard worn by Emperor Napoleon III
= synonyms: imperial beard
